title: Vegan Southwestern Style Loaded Sweet Potatoes With Airfried Tofu
directions: Lightly salt sweet potatoes and bake for 45 min- 1 hour
Adjust air fryer to 380 degrees F
Salt tofu generously, place in air fryer and cook 20 min
In a pan over high heat, saute garlic and onion for 2 min
Over medium-high heat, add spices to toast for about 30 seconds, constantly stirring
Cook for 8-10 min, adding small amounts of water as needed until broccoli is tender
Add lemon juice and black beans
Taste and season with salt and pepper again as needed
Once sweet potatoes are done, with a spoon carve a small well in the middle of each
Plate with a spinach salad if wanted and fill potatoes with bean mixture
Top with the extra onion, avocado, and air fried tofu
ingredients: 1 onion, diced and leaving some for topping
1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
